body:
The Two-Way 
 Clinton Directs Team To Release Private Email Server She Used As Secretary Of State






Clinton directed her staff to turn over the private email server she used as secretary of state after questions were raised about possible classified information in emails sent from the server.
description: Clinton directed her staff to turn over the private email server she used as secretary of state after questions were raised about possible classified information in emails sent from the server.
title: Hillary Clinton Decides To Release Private Email Server To Justice Department
